issue.title: FCD Ballot Comment US-164
issue.discussion: atomic_address has member functions compare_exchange_weak and compare_exchange_strong that take arguments of type const void*, in addition to the void* versions. If these member functions survive, there should be corresponding free functions.
issue.resolution: Add atomic_compare_exchange_weak and atomic_compare_exchange_strong free functions taking pointers to volatile and non-volatile atomic_address objects and const void* arguments.
